# MONEY::NETWORK_CASINO_BUY_CHIPS

## Summary
Maybe remove cash - add chips. can be called with amount 0. chips will be changed on consoles and value must > 0

## Parameters
* **INT** amount
* **INT** chips

## Returns
* **BOOL**
